title: Space flight
creator_contributor_role: New Zealand National Film Unit, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health education
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Physical fitness
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Smoking
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cigarette habit
description: Made by a special "Plasti-Cine" technique, in this film the hero, Dan, passes an amusing set of tests for health fitness, then flies a space rocket to the planet Venus. After battling the demon Nicotine, Dan persuades the Venusians to destroy the groves of cigarette trees to abolish smoking.
